section.title: 安装 K3s
section.para: K3S 的安装方式有多种，官方提供的 k3s-install.sh，还有第三方的 k3d 和 k3sup

section.title: Server 服务安装
section.screen: hostnamectl set-hostname master
curl -sfL https://get.k3s.io | sh -
curl -sfL http://rancher-mirror.cnrancher.com/k3s/k3s-install.sh | INSTALL_K3S_MIRROR=cn sh - systemctl enable k3s
[root@master ~]# kubectl get node NAME STATUS ROLES AGE VERSION localhost.localdomain Ready control-plane,master 28m v1.24.4+k3s1

section.title: k3d
section.para: k3d is a lightweight wrapper to run k3s (Rancher Lab’s minimal Kubernetes distribution) in docker.

section.title: ghcr.io 镜像下载问题
section.para: 创建集群始终停止在这里，这是因为 ghcr.io 被墙，无法访问。
section.screen: INFO[0004] Pulling image 'ghcr.io/k3d-io/k3d-proxy:5.4.4'
section.para: 找一台境外VPS安装K3D并创建集群，然后讲 k3d-proxy 镜像保存为文件。
section.screen:
[docker@netkiller ~]$ docker images REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID CREATED SIZE ghcr.io/k3d-io/k3d-proxy 5.4.4 5a963719cb39 2 weeks ago 42.4MB ghcr.io/k3d-io/k3d-tools 5.4.4 741f01cb5093 2 weeks ago 18.7MB
[docker@netkiller ~]$ docker save 5a963719cb39 -o k3d-proxy.tar
docker load --input k3d-proxy.tar

section.title: k3s 80/443 端口问题
section.screen: [root@master ~]# kubectl get svc --namespace=kube_system NAME TYPE CLUSTER-IP EXTERNAL-IP PORT(S) AGE kube-dns ClusterIP 10.43.0.10 <none> 53/UDP,53/TCP,9153/TCP 4d2h metrics-server ClusterIP 10.43.88.112 <none> 443/TCP 4d2h traefik LoadBalancer 10.43.125.52 172.18.200.5,172.18.200.51 80:32623/TCP,443:31516/TCP 4d2h
section.para: 本地没有 80 和 443 端口
section.screen:
[root@master ~]# ss -tnlp | egrep "80|443" LISTEN 0 1024 *:6443 *:* users:(("k3s-server",pid=173779,fd=17))
[root@master ~]# lsof -i :80 [root@master ~]# lsof -i :443
[root@master ~]# telnet 172.18.200.5 80 Trying 172.18.200.5... Connected to 172.18.200.5. Escape character is '^]'.
